<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085839</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading primary sources: an introduction for students</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ablesen von von Primärquellen: eine 
Einleitung für Kursteilnehmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lecture des sources primaires : une 
introduction pour des étudiants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lendo fontes preliminares: uma introdução 
para estudantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettura delle sorgenti primarie: 
un'introduzione per gli allievi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάγνωση των αρχικών πηγών: μια εισαγωγή για 
τους σπουδαστές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lectura de fuentes primarias: una 
introducción para los estudiantes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A step-by-step guide for students examining primary sources, with specific questions divided into five layers of questioning.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine schrittweisee Anleitung für die 
Kursteilnehmer, die Primärquellen überprüfen, wenn die spezifischen
Fragen geteilt sind in fünf Schichten Ausfragen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un guide pas à pas pour des étudiants examinant 
des sources primaires, avec des questions spécifiques divisées en 
cinq couches d'interrogation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma guia passo a passo para os estudantes que 
examinam fontes preliminares, com as perguntas específicas divididas 
em cinco camadas de questionar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una guida graduale per gli allievi che esaminano 
le sorgenti primarie, con le domande specifiche divise in cinque 
strati di interrogazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας βαθμιαίος οδηγός για τους σπουδαστές που 
εξετάζουν τις αρχικές πηγές, με τις συγκεκριμένες ερωτήσεις που 
διαιρούνται σε πέντε στρώματα της επερώτησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía paso a paso para los estudiantes que 
examinan fuentes primarias, con las preguntas específicas divididas 
en cinco capas de preguntar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
